title: How to Make Boston Brown Bread

steps.title: Mix together the first 6 ingredients in a medium-sized bowl.
steps.content: Mix together the first 6 ingredients in a medium-sized bowl.

steps.title: Mix together the next 4 ingredients in a separate bowl.
steps.content: Mix together the next 4 ingredients in a separate bowl.

steps.title: Stir the two mixtures together thoroughly.
steps.content: Stir the two mixtures together thoroughly.

steps.title: Pour into a buttered one-pound coffee can and cover top tightly with aluminum foil.
steps.content: Pour into a buttered one-pound coffee can and cover top tightly with aluminum foil.

steps.title: Place on oven rack in a deep pan with a tight fitting lid.
steps.content: Place on oven rack in a deep pan with a tight fitting lid.

steps.title: Pour boiling water in the pan so that it comes halfway up the side of the can.
steps.content: Pour boiling water in the pan so that it comes halfway up the side of the can.

steps.title: Cover the pan and set the heat so that the water barely bubbles.
steps.content: Cover the pan and set the heat so that the water barely bubbles.

steps.title: Cook for two hours, or until a wooden skewer inserted into the middle of the loaf comes out clean.
steps.content: Cook for two hours, or until a wooden skewer inserted into the middle of the loaf comes out clean.

steps.title: Remove the coffee can from the water and allow to rest for 5 minutes.
steps.content: Remove the coffee can from the water and allow to rest for 5 minutes.

steps.title: Unmold and cool on rack before slicing.
steps.content: Unmold and cool on rack before slicing.
